::Aerotaur::
    His eyes blind with fury he doesn't notice Radistor break up until he is 
passing through where his back should have been.  He narrowly avoided 
colliding with a tree and came to an almost graceful stop.  He spots Hot Rod 
leaving.  He opens a com to him.  "Hot Rod.  Before you go too far, I need to 
talk to you.  It's about the Radicons."
